sentences.simplifiedText: 这个苹果的数目是五个。
sentences.traditionalText: 這個蘋果的數目是五個。
sentences.pinyin: zhè ge píng guǒ de shù mù shì wǔ gè.
sentences.translation: The amount of this apple is five.

sentences.simplifiedText: 由于落叶归根的数目增加，秋天的树叶已经几乎全掉了。
sentences.traditionalText: 由於落葉歸根的數目增加，秋天的樹葉已經幾乎全掉了。
sentences.pinyin: yóu yú luò yè guī gēn de shù mù zēng jiā, qiū tiān de shù yè yǐ jīng jī hū quán diào le.
sentences.translation: Due to the increasing amount of fallen leaves, almost all the leaves of the tree have fallen in the autumn.
